TopicTitle: Can someone link the KSP NASA stream?

Articles.Content: Is there a link so I can watch it?
Is there no link?
It's not being streamed AFAIK.
What nasa stream?? If there was one I must have missed that one as well..
He meant the KSP / NASA joint panel at SXSW Austin today where they talked about the asteroid retrieval mission pack. See the other appropriately named thread for a photo.
No stream was ever announced and my searches of youtube for Kerbal SXSW and Squad SXSW shows nothing so no one who attended has uploaded a video of it yet either.
Sorry, MacMan. The panel was not streamed. There are a few Twitch streams of the LANfest tournament, though.

He meant the KSP / NASA joint panel at SXSW Austin today where they talked about the asteroid retrieval mission pack. See the other appropriately named thread for a photo.

I missed that as well

I guess they didnt record a video of it then?

Sorry, MacMan. The panel was not streamed. There are a few Twitch streams of the LANfest tournament, though.

That's sooo disappointing. I don't know what you guys were thinking but I thought it'd be the other way around. Was it at least recorded to be posted later?

Seriously think about this. I'll be playing the game soon, but what other opportunity will I have to listen to actual NASA people on this subject?

That's sooo disappointing. I don't know what you guys were thinking but I thought it'd be the other way around. Was it at least recorded to be posted later?

Seriously think about this. I'll be playing the game soon, but what other opportunity will I have to listen to actual NASA people on this subject?

I really hope there is a recording of this.

That's sooo disappointing. I don't know what you guys were thinking but I thought it'd be the other way around. Was it at least recorded to be posted later?

Seriously think about this. I'll be playing the game soon, but what other opportunity will I have to listen to actual NASA people on this subject?

Right. Why would anyone stream or at least record joint NASA-SQUAD panel? Why would anyone post to the whole player base something other than a blurry image of an asteroid? It's not like it was a planned event, right, so that you have all your media material ready beforehand?

Gosh, I just realized what a cool potential factor there could've been here. A mockup NASA press conference about an incoming asteroid as a briefing (teaser) for the in-game mission - from REAL NASA guys.

Sorry, MacMan. The panel was not streamed. There are a few Twitch streams of the LANfest tournament, though.

Was there any reason why? It's a bit surprising to me, I was looking forward to seeing NASA people talk about ksp.
Still occasionally searching youtube for "KSP sxsw", "Kerbal sxsw", and "Squad sxsw" still nothing. So if anyone from the crowd videoed it they haven't uploaded it yet.
it appears squad are camera shy... or completely lacked a camera on trip.
SXSW would be the ones filming this event, same with all the others they host, we'll have to wait for them to make it available

SXSW would be the ones filming this event, same with all the others they host, we'll have to wait for them to make it available

any idea where such a video would be posted if ever? meaning got a link?
I wish, I have been looking as well, I will have to pester Maxmaps on this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71918-Live-Streams-of-the-SXSW-LANfest-Tournament?p=1011305#post1011305

Rowsdower linked two Twitch channels here. Unfortunately both are offline atm
Was filming prohibited during this event? You'd think that no KSP fans with phones were present.
Hope something turns up. It'd be interesting for sure.

At the moment, I'm unaware if any video was recorded. If anyone in attendance happened to catch some, speak now or forever hold your piece. Otherwise, the guys are getting back from Texas today so I'll be able to nudge them a bit better. I do know that calisker is now working on that long-awaited SXSW recap so it's something.
